title: Time-series
text: This tab focuses on time-series comparisons so you can visually check alignment and stability across datasets.

title: Time-series
text:
Time-series overlays
Each plot shows the reference (Airport) against targets (Buoy, ERA5, Town, and Virtual Climate Station -VCS) for a single variable.








Figure 1: Meteorological data fordaily average temperature (C) from different data sources (Airport, Buoy, ERA5, Town, VCS) around Lake Rotorua plotted against the reference data (Airport).













Figure 2: Meteorological data for daily average wind (m s⁻¹) from different data sources (Airport, Buoy, ERA5, Town, VCS) around Lake Rotorua plotted against the reference data (Airport).





Toggle between timeseries and hydrograph

Timeseries line plotHydrograph daily totals










Figure 3: Meteorological data for daily total precipitation (mm) from different data sources (Airport, Buoy, ERA5, Town, VCS) around Lake Rotorua plotted against the reference data (Airport).















Figure 4: Hydrograph for daily total precipitation (mm) from different data sources (Airport, Buoy, ERA5, Town, VCS) around Lake Rotorua plotted against the reference data (Airport).
